title: Oscar Pistorius Case Draws Attention To Judge's Background
teaser: The South African athlete was back in court following last month's culpable homicide in the shooting death of his girlfriend. Melissa Block talks to reporter Natasya Tay about the judge in the case.
contentencoded:
The South African Paralympic athlete was back in court this week following last month's culpable homicide verdict in the shooting death of his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp. Melissa Block talks to reporter Nastasya Tay about the judge in the case, who will be deciding Pistorius's sentence.
